import React, { Component } from "react" import { connect } from "react-redux" import { Button, Form, Grid, Header, Message, Segment } from "semantic-ui-react" class NewSongForm extends Component { constructor() { super() this.audioInput = React.createRef() this.state = { title: "", genre: "", description: "", song_link: '' } } handleNewSongSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() console.log(this.audioInput.current.files[0]) const newAudio = this.audioInput.current.files[0] this.setState({song_link: newAudio}) } handleNewSongChange = e => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } render() { console.log(this.state) return (
New Song
{/* */}
) } } export default connect( null, null )(NewSongForm)
